input.sentences: [male] excitedly posed by the football hall of fame sign .
he was so excited to be there | so that he could see famous footballs
and famous statues of the players inducted into the hall of fame .
he loved looking at all their old jerseys .
he just loved the history of the place | and he sadly watched as the sign faded off into the distance as he headed back home .
output.sentences: The man took a trip to the Football Hall of Fame.
He saw the bust of Dan Marino.
There are many artifacts to see and pose in front of.
The man could still see the sign as he left.
